TopicTitle: Help KSP, and Brush Up on How to Report Bugs for a nearly flawless post-release patch (if needed)

Articles.Content:
Just a reminder that 1.0 will need the community to all pitch in and report anything game annoying or breaking - and when you do so, do it politely, on the bug report forum, and screenshots if you have them and steps to reproduce if you can. Look for other reports first too before posting.

Let's make any post 1.0 patch a golden opportunity to make a great game even greater! (if we need it)

And have fun! 

See you in 1.0.

Hopefully make it as specific as possible too. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

See you on the other side!
